Class LinkBuilderFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.citytechinc.aem.bedrock.core.link.builders.factory.LinkBuilderFactory

public final class LinkBuilderFactory
extends Object

Factory for acquiring LinkBuilder instances.

LinkBuilderFactory

public LinkBuilderFactory()
Method Detail

forLink

public static LinkBuilder forLink(Link link)
Get a builder instance for an existing Link. The path, extension, title, and target are copied from the link argument.

Parameters:
link - existing link
Returns:
builder

forPage

public static LinkBuilder forPage(Page page)
Get a builder instance for a page. If the page contains a redirect, the builder will contain the redirect target rather than the page path.

Parameters:
page - page
Returns:
builder containing the path of the given page

forPage

public static LinkBuilder forPage(Page page,
                                  TitleType titleType)
Get a builder instance for a page using the specified title type on the returned builder.

Parameters:
page - page
titleType - type of page title to set on the builder
Returns:
builder containing the path and title of the given page

forPage

public static LinkBuilder forPage(Page page,
                                  boolean mapped)
Get a builder instance for a page. If the page contains a redirect, the builder will contain the redirect target rather than the page path.

Parameters:
page - page
mapped - if true, link path will be mapped through resource resolver
Returns:
builder containing the mapped path of the given page

forPage

public static LinkBuilder forPage(Page page,
                                  boolean mapped,
                                  TitleType titleType)
Get a builder instance for a page using the specified title type on the returned builder.

Parameters:
page - page
mapped - if true, link path will be mapped through resource resolver
titleType - type of page title to set on the builder
Returns:
builder containing the path and title of the given page

forPath

public static LinkBuilder forPath(String path)
Get a builder instance for a path.

Parameters:
path - content or external path
Returns:
builder containing the given path

forResource

public static LinkBuilder forResource(Resource resource)
Get a builder instance for a resource.

Parameters:
resource - resource
Returns:
builder containing the path of the given resource

forResource

public static LinkBuilder forResource(Resource resource,
                                      boolean mapped)
Get a builder instance for a resource using the mapped path on the returned builder.

Parameters:
resource - resource
mapped - if true, link path will be mapped through resource resolver
Returns:
builder containing the mapped path of the given resource
